Room.Name: Entrance to the Blue tower
Room.Description: You are standing within the confines of a tower built from blue tinged stones. The colour seems to almost glow with power as if magic were stored within the very walls themselves. The hallway leads east into the tower, and there is a large blue door in the west wall.

Room.Name: Within the Blue tower
Room.Description: This room is almost humming with power. The walls around you glow softly the blue colour of magic. Somewhere above you on the stairs leading up there is the sound of whispered incantations. Soft blue light filters down from above, like the room were being bathed in a blue sun.

Room.Name: A room bathed in blue light
Room.Description: You are standing in the middle of what feels like a warm sea of blue light. At first glance it would appear to be some sort of physical substance hanging in the air, but after being in it for just a short time you come to understand that it is pure energy that you are bathed in. Somehow the tower itself is not physically existing, but merely the product of so much magical force that it is solid enough to walk on and feel.Above you a column of searing blue light can be seen.

Room.Name: A room bathed in blue light
Room.Description: You are standing in the middle of what feels like a warm sea of blue light. At first glance it would appear to be some sort of physical substance hanging in the air, but after being in it for just a short time you come to understand that it is pure energy that you are bathed in. Somehow the tower itself is not physically existing, but merely the product of so much magical force that it is solid enough to walk on and feel.

At first glance it would appear to be some sort of physical substance hanging in the air, but after being in it for just a short time you come to understand that it is pure energy that you are bathed in. Somehow the tower itself is not physically existing, but merely the product of so much magical force that it is solid enough to walk on and feel. There is a column of searing blue light coming from the roof here.

At first glance it would appear to be some sort of physical substance hanging in the air, but after being in it for just a short time you come to understand that it is pure energy that you are bathed in. Somehow the tower itself is not physically existing, but merely the product of so much magical force that it is solid enough to walk on and feel. Above you a column of searing blue light can be seen.

Room.Name: Standing within a blinding blue light
Room.Description: The room is filled with a crackling blue energy that tingles your skin and blinds your eyes. All around you the magic building up within the tower swirls and crackles. A column of blue light descends through the floor here to a level lower down.

Room.Name: Standing within a blinding blue light
Room.Description: The room is filled with a crackling blue energy that tingles your skin and blinds your eyes. All around you the magic building up within the tower swirls and crackles. Above you there is a clear tunnel through the light.

Room.Name: Standing within a blinding blue light
Room.Description: The room is filled with a crackling blue energy that tingles your skin and blinds your eyes. All around you the magic building up within the tower swirls and crackles. A column of blue light descends through the floor here to a level lower down.

Room.Name: Standing within a blinding blue light
Room.Description: The room is filled with a crackling blue energy that tingles your skin and blinds your eyes. All around you the magic building up within the tower swirls and crackles. Above you there is a clear tunnel through the light.

Room.Name: Standing within a blinding blue light
Room.Description: The room is filled with a crackling blue energy that tingles your skin and blinds your eyes. All around you the magic building up within the tower swirls and crackles. A column of blue light descends through the floor here to a level lower down.

Room.Name: Standing within a blinding blue light
Room.Description: The room is filled with a crackling blue energy that tingles your skin and blinds your eyes. All around you the magic building up within the tower swirls and crackles. Above you there is a clear tunnel through the light.

Room.Name: Standing within a blinding blue light
Room.Description: The room is filled with a crackling blue energy that tingles your skin and blinds your eyes. All around you the magic building up within the tower swirls and crackles. A column of blue light descends through the floor here to a level lower down.

Room.Name: Standing within a blinding blue light
Room.Description: The room is filled with a crackling blue energy that tingles your skin and blinds your eyes. All around you the magic building up within the tower swirls and crackles. Above you there is a clear tunnel through the light.

Room.Name: On a shimmering blue platform
Room.Description: You are standing upon a flat platform suspended above the warm blue energy fields below. The sounds of sizzling energy crackle in the air, and the smell of burning ozone reeks all around you. A tunnel of light leads back down, or you can go east to what looks like a stairwell.

Room.Name: On a shimmering blue platform
Room.Description: You are standing upon a flat platform suspended above the warm blue energy fields below. The sounds of sizzling energy crackle in the air, and the smell of burning ozone reeks all around you. A tunnel of light leads back down, or you can go south to what looks like a stairwell.

Room.Name: On a shimmering blue platform
Room.Description: You are standing upon a flat platform suspended above the warm blue energy fields below. The sounds of sizzling energy crackle in the air, and the smell of burning ozone reeks all around you. A tunnel of light leads back down, or you can go west to what looks like a stairwell.

Room.Name: On a shimmering blue platform
Room.Description: You are standing upon a flat platform suspended above the warm blue energy fields below. The sounds of sizzling energy crackle in the air, and the smell of burning ozone reeks all around you. A tunnel of light leads back down, or you can go north to what looks like a stairwell.

Room.Name: Before the burning blue stairwell
Room.Description: You are at the bottom of a stairwell wreathed in blue flames. Strangely there is no heat of smoke, and the flames that lick the stairs do not seem to be fuelled by anything. The magic at this part of the tower is obviously so strong that it manifests itself as raw fire, but blue and without the heat. The stairs head upwards.

Room.Name: On a balcony wreathed in blue fire
Room.Description: You are at the top of a stairwell covered in flickering blue flames. The room here is more of a balcony overlooking the shimmering blue lake of energy below. There is a door to the south.

Room.Name: The Witch Queen's Watch
Room.Description: This room is unlike any other in the tower. There is no energy shimmering in the air, no crackling sounds or burning blue flames. Rather it is a plain and empty study with nothing of interest but a single pentegram inscribed in the floor for protection against some kind of unholy beast. The only exit is to the north through the door.

NPC.name: spirit mage
NPC.description: This figure appears almost tangible, yet not quite. Something about it's face seems to show despair and anger, although if it is directed at you is unsure. All you know is that it appears to be guarding the way past.
NPC.longDescription: A transparent figure in flowing robes stands here.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden PassDoor DetectIllusion DarkVision

NPC.name: blue ghost
NPC.description: The energy around this figure is so strong that it has formed a permenant blue aura of crackling power. It raises it's withered hand and points at you, sending sizzling blue energy through the air!
NPC.longDescription: A deathly looking old man surrounded by a blue aura is here.
NPC.shortDescription: a ghost with a blue aura
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Undead Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: elven lich archmage
NPC.description: This ancient elven wizard is all that remains of Myth Drannor's once powerful mage cabals. He exists now as a shell of his former power, brought back by the evil that destroyed the city and kept as a taunting reminder of the fall of the elves. The power of pure magic hums around him and even his eyes glow with the blue energy that sizzles in the air.
NPC.longDescription: An elf with torn dried skin and glowing blue eyes is here.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary DetectIllusion Flying PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: witch queen
NPC.description: This lady was one of the few elves who chose to be lead by the darkness that overcame Myth Drannor, and as a reward she now rules this small tower where all the magic of the ancient elves is gathered in preperation for the release of the Lord.
NPC.longDescription: A beautiful elven woman with cold blue eyes screams in fury!
NPC.shortDescription: the witch queen of Myth Drannor
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Undead Mage Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: devil familiar
NPC.description: This unholy familiar has the markings of a servant of darkness. It's body is covered in symbols guarding against control by those not of the darkest soul.
NPC.longDescription: A beast with a single black horn and symbols burned into it's flesh is here.

Item.Name: parchment blue tinted seal
Item.LongDescription: A piece of parchment scrawled with blue writing is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The writing on the parchment relates how the elves of Myth Drannor were used as sacrifices to provide the pure blood needed to help raise and evil of total corruption and unspeakable power that lay dormant beneath the city. Thie red bloodletting was to be accompanied by two other merging powers, that of the pure magics, the blue energies, and the divine magics, green energies. Yet something went wrong and now forces of darkness are fighting for the last keys to the power that lies hidden. Once the red, blue and green are finally joined the black tower will reveal it's secrets..

Item.Name: blue crystal tiara
Item.LongDescription: An intricate tiara formed from blue crystal is on the ground.

Item.Name: blue ice dagger
Item.LongDescription: A dagger carved from deep blue ice is on the floor.

Item.Name: blue sapphire collar
Item.LongDescription: A perfectly formed collar of blue sapphire is here.

Item.Name: wand spellfire
Item.LongDescription: A deadly looking wand covered in blue green flames is here.

Item.Name: gold ring wizardry
Item.LongDescription: A shiny golden ring is on the ground.

Item.Name: blue key
Item.LongDescription: A key of some strange blue material is here.

Item.Name: gold ring wizardry
Item.LongDescription: A shiny golden ring is on the ground.
